name: Hua Shan
description:
Introduction

Hua Shan (Sacred Mountain) is an amazing hiking spot in China.

Approach

Descent

It has a Via Ferrata near the top, it is actually a short route BUT very exposed with 3000ft of air underneath. It's not that dangerous, as you are clipped in all the time. Except that the Chinese provide you with a chest harness that is not very safe, so better don't fall! People do this route to reach a temple where to put their 'love lockers' or 'money lockers' (you can see some in the video).

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

  • Chris Brennen's Adventure Hikes (World) : Hua Shan
